data.text: (ג) His seed shall be mighty upon earth:
(ה) Wealth and riches shall be in his house:
(ז) Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness:
(ט) A good man sheweth favour, and lendeth:
(כ) Surely he shall not be moved for ever:
(מ) He shall not be afraid of evil tidings:
(ס) His heart is established, he shall not be afraid,
(פ) He hath dispersed, he hath given to the poor;
(ר) The wicked shall see it, and be grieved;
